```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# load libraries
library(highcharter)
library(quantmod)

# helper function to emit a highchart with the gridlight theme
stock_chart <- function(series) {
  highchart() %>% 
    hc_add_series_ohlc(series) %>%
    hc_add_theme(hc_theme_gridlight())
}

# retrive symbols
getSymbols(c("GOOG", "AAPL", "AMZN", "FB"), from = "2014-01-01", auto.assign=TRUE)
```

### Google

```{r}
stock_chart(GOOG)
```

### Apple

```{r}
stock_chart(AAPL)
```

### Amazon

```{r}
stock_chart(AMZN)
```

### Facebook

```{r}
stock_chart(FB)
```
